website_summaries.verdict: The studio-friendly Beyerdynamic DT 240 Pro headphones deliver accurate, crisp audio for a refreshingly affordable price.
pros: Detailed audio performance with clear highs and solid bass depth
cons: Not for those seeking heavily boosted bass response

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to use on my travels although they are not noise cancelling they do have good passive isolation and are easier to drive so plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Beyerdynamics. First pair are DT770s. Compared to those studio monitors the DT 240s give a detailed sound but with slightly less space between instruments and vocals. however there is a little bit more bass with more excitement. The DT 770s are more clinical in presentation. I bought these to use on my travels although they are not noise cancelling they do have good passive isolation and are easier to drive so plenty of volume from phone or tablet. Another pro is the detachable cable.
customer_reviews.author: R Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, too small and too tight
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing, especially if listening on a Hi-Fi or a computer (but certainly low enough impedence to listen on a phone but I wouldn't walk around with 100 bucks on my head). Virtually no sound leak although the sound isolation for the listener is not that good, you can't just pop them on in the office without music and think you'll have some quiet - plus why put yourself in the vice-like grip if not listening to music. Too tight, the cans are quite small as well, and I thought I had a narrow face.. Sound quality makes up for it however.
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to listen to meditation clips on YouTube and music on my Samsung mobile. I was able to use them straight out of the box and plugged into my phone, they are a really comfortable fit and when meditating they block out other sounds so enabling me to concentrate. The added benefit at this time of year is when I'm listening to my music on my lunch time walk they keep my ears warm too and don't mess my hair up like a hat would :-) Amazing pair of headphones and would (and will) recommend them very highly.
customer_reviews.author: T Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Superb professional studio sounds
customer_reviews.text: First, let's talk about construction. Made with good quality materials and the ear coverings are soft and luxurious. The headband is adjustable and strongly made. The sound is superb. As a retired professional musician, I have used all the top brands provided in recording studios and these are as good as any of them. Solid rich bass with good performance in middle and high range too, and I would recommend these to anyone that is serious about listening to speech or music in the highest quality at a price most people can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and true sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was how comfortable they are to wear. Specifically the almost wrapped under my ears making them feel secure. The soft leather cushions also completely closed of my ear. The sound is true... I couldn't perceive any exaggerated equalization or, stated more accurately no compromise on audio quality.. Whether listening to music or speech, the audio sounds exactly like it should. The leather covers are easy to remove and replace for cleaning for example. My son (7yo) also uses them, and with a much smaller head than mine doesn't have any difficulty with the same snug fit. They work just as well for him as they do for me. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a nice sound, let down by the cable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones' sound good and the earpads are very comfortable, but they're actually half-way between an on-ear (supra-aural) and an over-ear (circumnaural) design. The top fits around my ears, but the bottom squashes my earlobes. Because of the softness of the memory foam, this is not uncomfortable - just not what I was expecting. The headphones are let down by the cable which is rather stiff, and the plug connecting it to the headphones is a little loose, so whenever the cable brushes against anything it is clearly audible and can be distracting.
customer_reviews.author: S W.

customer_reviews.title: Good but with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of headphones from Beyer, the build quality is exceptionally good for this price point. The frequency response is fairly balanced, but compared to other headphones I have used (as a professional recording engineer and based on even slightly cheaper headphones) they do lack the Treble sparkle to my ears (in the 8k upwards region) that I am used to so I have to eq the sound from my unit. The result is a sometimes sound that is erring on the slightly boxy but at this price that is not that uncommon in my experience. But Despite this overall they are still a quality piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I start by the bad point : * first minute , i know directly i cant have this headphone on my head more than 1 hours,, they use the technique of tightening the heaphone to reduce noise, and its a bit painful after 30 min,, the nice thing , sound are really perfect,, i ear some sound, note, i never ear before with my favorite playlist,, im a bit disapointed because the pain , kill the pleasure to use the headphone,, but he sounds nice,, i have another cheap headphone, lol 15 euro,, they are so smoothie, but sounds not same, for sure,, and rly big
customer_reviews.author: Arnaud van weehaege

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget headphones
customer_reviews.text: As far as budget headphones go, these are right up there! The ear cups fit snugly around the ear which helps to isolate external noise and the build quality is high as expected from Beyerdynamic (the headband even utilises a metal runner). They are compact and lightweight so I feel they will be great for my future travel plans. The bass is surprisingly well-pronounced yet accurate which I did not expect from a cheaper pair of cans. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amoeba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality And Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to listen to her music and she loves them. Great sound quality. The cable plugs in either side, so that's handy. I can sympathise with the people with big ears, as the cups are not huge but certainly big enough and comfortable enough for my wife and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Opened my ears
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an upgrade to a pair of Pioneer headphones. Been wanting a better quality system but previously unsure of how much improvement was possible. Decided on these based on price (I.e. not megabucks!) and I'm thrilled with the result. Bottom end reproduction is powerful but punchy and mid and top ranges clear and precise. They're really comfortable too and the feel and presentation is really premium. Really pleased to have taken the plunge with these cans (came next day for free as well).
customer_reviews.author: Andy Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: The DT240s (34 ohms) offer good quality sound with noticeable low end and accurate sound reproduction. They do a good job of keeping sound overspill to a minimum while rejecting background noise at the same time. They fit nicely over my ears and still felt comfortable after approximately one hour of constant use. They feel fairly snug and can imagine those with larger heads might notice this more. I'll continue using my DT250s (250 ohms) with my home setup and opt for these when on the move due to the lightweight design and handy bag included in the box. For people who like headphones, the quality and price won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: polyphax

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and excellent sound quality. I had to ease the headband over some books for a night to make them comfy when initially received. Very flat sound, which suits me, as my ears aren't great after decades of earphone use. Noise cancelling not great if you intend to use them on a treadmill, but I have some sennheisers 4.50 for this use. Otherwise great home listening headphones
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a replacement to my DT100s I prefer these DT 240s quality wise, its a fuller richer sound but still lots of precise detail. The cans are quite small so they dont fit completely over my big ears - so could become uncomfortable if used for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my video editing work. The sound quality is excellent - I'm definitely hearing a different world! As for the comfort, they do squeeze my head a little bit, and my head is already on the smaller side, so I imagine it may feel even tighter for people with bigger build...
customer_reviews.author: Anita Zhuo

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder pair of cans.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Loud, Comfortable and compact Good for daily use and live mixing/studio, quite good noise isolation. Negatives: terrible and useless cloth pouch, Sound resonates through the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Quality. Looks slick
customer_reviews.text: The DT 240 PRO headphones are absolutely incredible! The sound quality is like no other, pure & precise, great for recording too. Also really comfortable to wear with the Ergonomic headband and soft ear pads for hours of wearing comfort ,so great for commuting etc on long journeys & when listening to any ios devices etc. I’ve always bought Beyerdynamic equipment, Headphones, Microphones and I’m not about to change now .. 5⭐️
customer_reviews.author: J Mishon

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Beyerdynamic headphones, these are unfortunately sonically average at best.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Entry level headphones not for outside use
customer_reviews.text: It's my portable headphones, but they are not so good for outside usage. Firstly the noise of wind you can hear is not acceptable,also the sound quality is average even I use my Fiio amp. Solid build and good materials, makes it worth £65
customer_reviews.author: Dompel79

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones at a great price. These DT240 Pro’s seem very well built and came well packaged. Sound quality so far has been excellent, with a good mid-range and a solid bass response. I’ll be using them on the move, mainly for travel; Audiobooks, Podcasts and Music, so the cary bag is a nice addition. All in all, very happy with my purchase. My first pair of Beyer headphones, they won’t be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie C

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Another great set of cans from beyerdynamic. Excellent sound quality, with deep bass and detailed highs. Isolation of environmental sound is great due to the circumaural design. They're physically smaller than typical studio headphones so great for listening/ creating on the go whilst still packing a sonic punch. The headphone cable can be connected to a 2.5mm socket on either the left or right of the headphones, meaning the DT 240 PROs are great for both left/right handed users. They come with a soft pouch, and a 1/4" adapter so they can be used with pro or consumer devices. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Midnight Rambler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound and Build Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Order these for my daughter after they were highly recommended by a friend. Thought I’d test them out prior to giving them to her and i have to say the sound quality is second to none, really crisp and clear whilst offering a great bass. My daughter use to moan about the comfort of her previous headphones but so far after a few hours still no moaning. Would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: dawn roscoe

customer_reviews.title: excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, well made and sound great. Perfect for monitoring in-field recordings or occasionally listening to your music on the ride to work.
customer_reviews.author: STP

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily. The sound is great although when I wear them for too long it feels uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kate Z

customer_reviews.title: DT 240  headphones
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t work out for me because they were too uncomfortable. I do think they offer a fantastic sound.
customer_reviews.author: Keep it simple

customer_reviews.title: did not last three months
customer_reviews.text: First the earpads came off then the cable stopped working properly so one only one earpiece works
customer_reviews.author: k.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound especially for binaural beats. Highly recommend and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very good
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, blocks out all other sound, plug in on either side, cable could be slightly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good clean design. But the earpads are somewhat uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Compact, good minimalistic design. Really like the headphones. But the earpads are very uncomfortable , make it almost impossible to wear it for a few hours straight. Which is a shame as it could be a very good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Khoa

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very good audio, but to be honest ... after 2 hours of use, my ears hurt a little. I will still buy them. Really nice noise cancellation
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Gobbi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, when listening to high definition audio files one can really appreciate the quality they offer. I am a very critical and analytical listener of all kinds of genres. With these headphones you can really appreciate well produced music. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J Mcmurdo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced, slightly warm sound with excellent timing. Comfortable for up to medium size ears. Great built quality (for the price outstanding).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Quality
customer_reviews.text: They arrived very quickly once i ordered them. I took these away with me on holiday and just arrived in time. They sound really great and I really like that you can put the headphone jack into the left or right side. Overall for the price paid a great on ear headphone.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound !
customer_reviews.text: I haved before DT 770 Pro but they was too big. This model is ideal for traveling and mixing. Beyerdynamic is the best !
customer_reviews.author: Burtules

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality is amazing in these Headphones, great for tracking vocals & mixing in the studio. Very light & well constructed in both metal & Plastic, great Isolation, had them on this morning mixing down, what a treat, would recommend these to anyone recording. Quality Headphones indeed
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality & reproduction of sound
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality of build and fit nicely on the ears with quite a good amount of isolation. A great reference sound for both home studio use as well as a great product to listen to while on the move from iPhone etc.
customer_reviews.author: Macfan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money!!
customer_reviews.text: The only detail is smaller than I thought but fit to me and don't have small ear and head neither.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Well built but still lightweight. Sounds far better than what I've expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Even if is a piece of plastic with the best!
customer_reviews.text: Beyerdynamic are better than Pioneer and of any others professional headphone! 5 Star
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my son. He's very pleased with them, comfortable and good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good overall
customer_reviews.text: Sound is solid. Feel great on your head. Ear pads come off easily and are annoying put back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for recording.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I’m a musician and I’ve recently made an in-house studio to record. I was in the market for some good headphones and decided to try these out. They are excellent. The sound quality is perfect. Very even sound. No drowning bass just pure. They’re noise cancelling which is perfect so I do not get disturbed. I love this feature because it makes the sound even better. They are really comfortable. I was surprised. I had no issues with the comfort. Usually I can’t stand the feeling of headphones, but these fit snug and nicely, didn’t bother me at all. I definitely recommend these to any recording musician or basically anyone. They’re great. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: S newby

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away with the sound of these. I usually use a few different headsets and have to change them constantly so that I can get that crystal clear sounds half way with just one set. With these, it was just one set. I was very excited. The quality of these headphones is superb and the durability is out of this world. They are very flexible as well. Another thing I liked was the carrying bad that came with them. This helps with making sure that they are not going to get ruined during my travels. I do highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiJohnson12

customer_reviews.title: Great dynamic sounds!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great pair of headphones to upgrade my movie experience. I watch streaming videos with these headphones so my husband can get son sleep. The sound is fantastic and they are comfortable even while wearing for a long time. The bass is deep and resonate, and overall dynamic. I’ve replaced my more expensive phones with these for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I spent how much?
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are simply amazing. I’ve been in the Pro audio and video space for over 30 years, and these headphones sound every bit as good as a 500 dollar pair of Senheisers. The sound bleed is almost nonexistent, and the sound quality is out of this world. It maid me say to myself, “I spent how much?” Seriously, these aren’t the cheapest headphones out there, but you’d be crazy to spend $500 when you can get these for under 100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: I think these headphones might be indestructible
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are incredible. The sound quality is very good - maybe not excellent, but it’s pretty great - but, more importantly to me, the quality of the product is remarkable. I break headphones like nobody’s business. The longest I’ve ever had a pair of headphones is around 4 months. I’ve had these headphones for 7 months and there is absolutely no sign that they’re wearing out. I take these headphones everywhere I go. They go straight in my tote when I leave the house. I even sleep with them on. I’m not exactly careful with them, but they’re still in great shape. August 2020 update: these headphones are still in perfect condition, after hundreds of hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Osterhout

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are well balanced headphones that feel durable at a reasonable price. The only downside for me is that ears do hurt after long use because the pads are smaller than regular over-ear headphones. I chose these because there were no delivery options for the Sennheiser HD280 and the Sony 7506’s chord is too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT EXPERIENCE !!!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1) for monitor headphones in recording it has a flat EQ compared to the current ones I’m using. 2) the isolation of the cans themselves is remarkable 3) the jack in for the headphones can be plugged into either left side or right side making my recording setup not affected by a tether. CONS: 1) the only con I have is that the 8th- 1/4 adapter adapter provided requires to be screwed in which is not my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Allie121

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound indecent isolation
customer_reviews.text: These headphones fit great they also sound amazing but the first time I used them out in the field the ear pads came off and we're very hard to get back on
customer_reviews.author: Kevsac916

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are great! They are super comfortable and provide excellent quality. I use them for my podcast (ShowStarters) and I dont have the issue of audio feedback into my mic like I had with others. On top of the performance, they are super comfortable! My only wish is that there was a bluetooth attachment available!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not what they should be
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable, and the cord was a decent length although it should have been longer. I had to return these as every time the cord moved there was a thumping sound. There is no excuse for that in something at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: ZenDodge69

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, wish they were bigger
customer_reviews.text: They have great sound to them, can almost tell that higher quality sound is there. My only wish is that hey enclosed your ears a little bit more to give a surround sound type feel. But other than that, they work great and sound great, especially when gaming and it feels like you're in the environment due to such high-def sound. A pretty nice headset to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Profesional!!! Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones. They’re clear, sound good. Great for the price. I had difficulty finding headphones with padding at the top, other than expensive ones. Was glad to find these. I listen to music, produce music play video games often I have no complaints with these. Also nice that the ear parts rotate to make the headphones flat. Worked great in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Angely Perez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are AMAZING!!! As a dj and music lover I love that it cancels the outside noises and allows you to focus on the music. Its sound is LOADED heavy bass and can withstand high volume without distortion. Its a great headphone at this price point
customer_reviews.author: ABUCHI

customer_reviews.title: As excellent as usual
customer_reviews.text: I had a DT770 32ohm. DT770 has great great potential. When pairing when good player, good eq, the sound is top level. I'm a bass fan, so I mostly care about clear and deep bass, and sound stage. DT240's sound quality is as 99% good as DT770, or I can say no difference. But due to the smaller driver size, the sound stage is obviously a little smaller. Overall, this is a great great headphone, best headphone under $80
customer_reviews.author: allenlsy

customer_reviews.title: Real-life audio
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the sound isolation and the audio is like real-life as if I'm there. It's comfortable to wear. However, the clamping pressure at the beginning felt a bit too stiff for me but I can move with them and they won't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but a bit snug
customer_reviews.text: The comfort of the headphones was not great for extended period of time as they compressed my head quite a bit. The sound quality was impressive in some areas and a little lacking in others. The bass could’ve been more pronounced but the high end was nice. Overall I’d say that these are fine headphones for someone with a small head or someone using them for short amounts of time. Not good for audio production in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R Waber

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They fit over my ears and are comfortable. They are a little tight as they are new. I love the sound and listen to my audible books every night while I crochet! I really think for the price the quality is quite high. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Moninya Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Sound is excellent, uncomfortable (as many have said) BUT cord makes big noise when moving
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent for mixing/listening (doesn't boost the bass). The ear cups are small and not very comfortable for long wearing (I knew this going in) BUT the deal breaker was the cord makes a relatively load rustling noise if you move your head. Also be aware that the vendor, Audiosavings, does not pay return shipping - buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great cans
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing. And quality is awesome. The ear cups are a bit small though and my ears touch the inside of the cups
customer_reviews.author: Ry-guy27

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral sound, too tight
customer_reviews.text: Well built, sound is neutral, sound stage is average. Out of the box they are way too tight, hurt ears after just 10 minutes, hope they will loosen up going forward. I would prefer velvet over leatherette which they used on pads, they get warm very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great for long wear!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a gift and he absolutely loves them. He has a desk job where he can wear them 8 hours a day and he finds them extremely comfortable to wear. Customer service was excellent when my pair arrived missing a component and sent a replacement within 2 days. I would highly recommend these to anyone who needs a high quality pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Sauter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. So headphones feel heavy or like they are squeezing my head. I didn't have that feeling with these headphones. I can have a noisy house sometimes with 4 kids around. I felt as though the headphones helped me filter out that ambient noise without having to turn them up extremely loud. They sound great. I didn't have any problem using them to editing my videos.
customer_reviews.author: The Densons

customer_reviews.title: REALLY bad ear cushion attachment
customer_reviews.text: these are terrible DO NOT BUY these headphones... After ONLY ONE month the ear cushions fall off...very low quality compared to other german products . go with another brand
customer_reviews.author: brad g dutz

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a month
customer_reviews.text: I have a biweekly podcast that I purchased these headphones for. Besides editing for the show I did not use the headphones. I was able to use the headphones for a total of 3 times (3 episodes) before the left ear went completely out. When I called amazon they were never able to get ahold of the seller or they said it wasn't there item so they couldn't replace.- Now I'm stuck with these broken headphones. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: Could wear these all day!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these to listen to podcasts at work. There are two things I absolutely love about these headphones 1) they are super comfortable. There are times I wear them for 2-6 hours at a time. I had no issue doing that with these headphones. 2) these headphones helped cancelled out background noise. They aren’t meant to cancel all noise, but they definitely helped keep the distractions around me down. I would definitely recommend them for long continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Trt012

customer_reviews.title: Hoping beyerdynamic honors their warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Blown speaker after 2 months and about 30 hairs of use. Not what I expect from a pair of headphones marketed as pro and especially not from beyerdynamic. This will be updated with their response.
customer_reviews.author: Pa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and it performs as described, solid purchase! It really isolates the sounds and transfers a clear and crisp music. Would definitely recommend to anybody looking to use it at home or even for profesional musicians. I hooked it up to my electric keyboard and my son to his guitar. Good quality, good price, overall a 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ari Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound- not a single piece of instructions in the box?.... Had to figure it out by myself? But great quality of unit.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality: not bad for the price. The highs were a bit blaring. Comfort: not very comfy. Material quality: the worst I've ever owned. The padding for right earphone fell off in a couple of weeks and jack went to poop in a month. Overall: waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin R.

customer_reviews.title: Clear clean sound
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Comfortable, not sweaty, great sound, not too much bass. Clear, crisp. Me likey
customer_reviews.author: walt haberstroh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I will say these are a little bass heavy leaving certain tracks sounding a little muddy although for price, the quality of this product is very hard to beat. Very durable and the L/R aux inputs make for ease of use. Would recommend for studio sessions, though not for mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all around sound. I tried these with various genres of music and all types sound very crisp and full. Great closed headphone for all around use at a very affordable price point. Try these today!
customer_reviews.author: L Drago

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have been one of the best purchases I’ve made. For the price they are amazing quality. I have used them go teach online English classes and the sound quality is really great. They are very noose cancelling and extremely Comfortable. I use them at the gym and they stay in place as well. I was able to run and lift with no problem with them staying in place. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price and good quality, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: The delivery is very fast. I'm satisfied with this service. And the item is more good than I expected. The sound is more like fine than artificial. So I think it is proper to enjoy in the indoor space. The price is very reasonable than other competitors' items.
customer_reviews.author: Junghuck Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort and lightness to these headphones, as well as the convienence of detaching the audio cable to reduce Frey of the cable, and the sound is well rounded, not sure if these would be effective in mixing down songs but I did enjoy using these for at home Dj mixing
customer_reviews.author: TYLER VANG

customer_reviews.title: Ears are saying Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 👌 headphones which actually sounds funtastic and also good for my ears. I was using some on ear headphones from last 2 years and after using 15 mins my ears start feel uncomfortable but this beyerdynamic DT 240 Pro is really comfortable on my ears. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfy
customer_reviews.text: Beyerdynamic is one of the most well known headphone company. They should know how to make cable as well. The included coiled headphone cables is disgusting and not convenient for outdoor use. Besides, the lower bass and mid bass cannot be separate.
customer_reviews.author: Kwok Cheung Chow

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: High quality sound! Practical and reliable headphones that I use every day! Very happy with the purchase for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks these are the best head phones ever! I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Zackery

customer_reviews.title: where were you all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I've put up with such crappy headphones for so long...
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality / price of this article im impressed of bass and high frequency, I had another headphones but never like this.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Balta Jhong

customer_reviews.title: The ones I got were used!
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes but received a used pair of headphones. This is my 3rd posting, 1st 2 were declined. That’s pretty sad, people should be made aware of this kind of practice. The original box seal was already broken, the cable was already opened and untied, and there were hairs on the ear cups. I would really appreciate it if someone would explain to me why and how this happened. Paid for new and got used.
customer_reviews.author: William B Manns

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced lo fidelity
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look good seem well made and are very comfortable. This is rendered unimportant by the poor sound quality, over emphasised bass muddled midrange and non existent treble. I'd be disappointed with something costing 20 pounds from the supermarket that were this poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money item
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money item, two items let it down, small ear pieces, and comfort therefore, and NOT made in Germany, very disappointed, but the sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: Housing on one arm broke. Replaced swiftly. Quality for Logic.
customer_reviews.author: chris g.

product_meta.title: beyerdynamic DT 240 PRO monitoring headphone
product_meta.description: A clean deep bass, a vivid midrange and a defined treble are part of the trusted beyerdynamic sound signature that each DT 240 PRO comes with. Precise and powerful drivers ensure a high output volume on all devices such as laptops, cameras and studio interfaces. The DT 240 PRO is made for Producers, podcasters and filmmakers who want to take full advantage of their equipment's potential.
feature_bullets: Professional studio Headphones for monitoring and recording with compact over-ear design
Powerful transducers to suit any studio and mobile application
True professional sound tuning for pure and precise reproduction
Superior isolation from background noise and minimal sound leakage
Lightweight ergonomic headband and soft ear pads for comfortable extended wear
